name: Airports, Airport Terminals, Flying Fields
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that operate and maintain airports and flying fields. Such
merchants may provide aircraft cleaning and janitorial services,
aircraft servicing and repair, aircraft storage at airports, and airport
hangar rental.
For merchants located within an airport terminal that sell food,
newspapers, or gift or souvenir items, use the appropriate MCC for
that business, such as MCC 5812 (Eating Places and Restaurants),
MCC 5994 (News Dealers and Newsstands), or MCC 5947 (Gift,
Card, Novelty, and Souvenir Shops).
